subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Eugenie Bouchard, a Canadian whose mother was fascinated by the British royal family, will face Simona Halep, a Romanian, in the women’s semifinals at Wimbledon.
snippet: Eugenie Bouchard, a Canadian whose mother was fascinated by the British royal family, will face Simona Halep, a Romanian, in the women’s semifinals at Wimbledon.
